content: happy mandala is a result after i spent a night playing a little with a pen and paper while playing cards with my partner and best friend i was just sitting and drawing a little crumbling on a piece of paper and it ended up as my first chart the next day i sat with a hook and yarn and continued playing with the pattern which eventually became the result of my first free pattern that i did the name comes after i had fun and realized how fun it was to make patterns and write them down the whole i felt happy and the joy of feeling i had in me when i finished could not even be described with words i hope you will enjoy my pattern and please refer to my page / pattern and tag me in social media with @virkvinga or #virkvinga so i can enjoy your nice creations
